name: Studio Lumini
description:
Lumini is a digital production studio. Because we think that the container is as important as the content, we group together creative, flashers, animators, developers, graphic designers, and directors within the same team, to give a digital life to the ideas and to answer all the problems, whatever the medium.
This melting pot of skills is initiated by the founding members, Areski Ferhat, Nicolas PÃ¢ris & Guillaume Rebbot, respectively photo director, motion designer and designer-editor of training.
